title: T-MAGAZINE -- please help ID! :)
content:
Two typefaces: headline + subhead (serifa?)

Can anyone identify?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 5.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113005/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%205_24.png) | 10.76 KB |

 [‹ como agua para chocolate](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113005/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45917 "Go to previous forum topic") [iTunes Header Sans Serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113005/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45922 "Go to next forum topic")
author: avenir04

comments.content: I think the slab serif is [Stymie](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113005/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/stymie).
The Symie, while similar to the original, is custom designed by [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113005/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%252BCarter).
